New Records: Nick Castellanos hit a go-ahead two-run homer in the seventh inning, Brandon Marsh hit a three-run shot in the sixth
Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a go-ahead two-run homer in the seventh inning
Brandon Marsh hit a three-run shot in the sixth
Matt Olson homered twice for the Braves, including a 450-foot two-run drive over the batter's eye in deep center field in the third
Pre-Game Insights: There's a lot on the line for both teams,A good rivalry. One of the better rivalries in baseball right now. It's going to be a fun weekend.
Post-Match Reflections: The Phillies hold a six-game lead over the Braves for the division crown after taking the opener of a four-game series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies appeared on cruise control toward the NL East title after opening with the best 60-game start of any team since the 2001 Seattle Mariners
Orion Kerkering (3-2) struck out two in 1 1/3 scoreless innings of relief for the win
Others: Phillies 3B Alec Bohm left the game after the second inning with left-hand discomfort
The Braves send RHP Reynaldo López (7-4, 2.02 ERA) to the mound against Phillies LHP Ranger Suárez (11-5, 2.82 ERA)
